name: Pleasure Airlines
description:
Pleasure Airlines is an adult and erotic visual novel developed by the Kavorka team. In this story, you are in a 15 hour flight with your cute best friend, a sexy flight attendant, a beautiful pilot and an interesting food cart man. It’s a long flight, and anything can happen.
  • 3 dateable waifus and 1 husbando.
  • 4 different endings.
  • Erotic comedy.
Gameplay
  • Choices matter in the character affection.
  • Erotic sex scenes with the character of your affection.
  • Different endings based on your choices.
  • 1 hours of gameplay every storyline.
